DESCRIPTION:
    2010, a small Caribbean country. Most of the island is on fire rebellion. The government army is trying to suppress the rebellion, and powerful drug cartels set out to destroy the indigenous Indian population of the island, destroying entire villages. However, this situation is pretty typical for Latin America. Along with Saul Meyers, you explore a huge, open world and fully experience the atmosphere of the Latin American flavor ... and reveal some mysterious disappearances and still stay alive. 
    To achieve the goal, we will be available to transport a variety of managed funds and a huge selection of "barrels" but our main weapon - it's wit and cunning. "Xenus 2: White Gold" - a high-quality dynamic FPS, built on a modern engine, providing a huge seamless world, the actual physics of the landscape and the environment, smart AI and free gameplay.
